data.text: Yahweh detests people who use scales that do not weigh correctly;
People who are proud will eventually be disgraced;
People who are good are guided by doing what is honest;
Your money will not help you on the day that God judges and punishes people;
When people are honest and good, that will ◄direct their paths/show them what is right for them to do►;
God rescues/protects righteous people because they ◄are honest/do what is right►,
When wicked people die, they cannot confidently expect to receive anything that is good;
Yahweh rescues righteous people from their troubles/difficulties;
Godless people can ruin others by what they say [MTY],
When things go well for righteous people, the people in [MTY] their city are happy,
When righteous people request God to bless a city, that city will become great,
It is foolish to despise others;
Those who ◄spread gossip/tell bad things about others► will tell your secrets to others,
A nation will be destroyed/ruined if it does not have leaders who guide it wisely;
If you promise a stranger that you will pay his debt if he cannot pay it himself, you will regret it.
People honor/respect women who are kind/gracious;
Those who are kind benefit themselves because others will be kind to them,
If wicked people earn a lot of money, that will deceive them because they will not keep it for very long,
Those who always do what is right will live a long/happy life,
Yahweh hates those who are always thinking about doing evil things,
It is certain that Yahweh will punish evil people
It is ◄unsuitable/not proper/disgusting► for a beautiful woman not to know what is right to do,
When the things that righteous people want happen, it brings good to them and to others,
Some people give their money generously to poor people, but they become richer in spite of that,
Those who give generously to others will prosper;
People curse/despise someone who hoards his grain and does not sell it, waiting to get a higher/bigger price for it,
If you sincerely want to do what is right, people will respect you,
Those who trust in their money will disappear like the withered leaves that fall from the trees,
Those who bring troubles to their families will inherit nothing [MET] from them,
Those who live righteously will live for a long time,
Sometimes righteous people are rewarded here on the earth,
